  • Constructor Details

    • AdminFacade

      public AdminFacade​(AdminUser user, UserRepository userRepository, WalletManager walletManager, ArtManager artManager)
      An umbrella/facade use-case class for an admin user. Primarily, it is used as a skeleton for other use-cases related to admin user actions.
      Parameters:
      user - entity.user.AdminUser entity methods and use-cases will interact with.
      userRepository - an UserRepository instance
      walletManager - a WalletManager instance
      artManager - an ArtManager instance

  • Method Details

    • banUser

      public void banUser​(java.lang.String username, java.time.LocalDateTime banUntil)
      Temporarily ban a user.
      Parameters:
      username - username of User intended for ban.
      banUntil - ban the user until the date-time banUntil.
      See Also:
      BanUser

    • createUser

      public void createUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, boolean isAdmin)
      Create a user.
      Parameters:
      username - username for created user.
      password - password for created user.
      isAdmin - if the created user is an entity.user.AdminUser.
      See Also:
      CreateUser

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser​(java.lang.String username)
